name: For the King (itch)
description: For the King is a local competitive game centered around trying to please the mighty king (Steve from Minecraft - please don't sue us Microsoft).  Play with 2 - 4 friends and collect resources, forge armor, and repair the king's statue. The winner is whoever gets to place the crown on the statue! Smack your friends with your trusty hammer, or throw it across the map for a game winning steal in this non-stop frenzy of multiplayer fun goodness.
